alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Inland Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:22PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Bay County through 500 PM EDT/400 PM CDT/... At 422 PM EDT/322 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Panama City Beach, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Bayhead, West Bay, St Andrews State Park, Southport, Magnolia Beach, Recota Beach, Vicksburg, Camp Flowers and Laird. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
